review_title: A progressive workplace with amazing coworkers
pros:
Villa Charities is making a difference and a lasting impact on the communities they are involved with. If you have ever dreamed about working with a passionate, collaborative, committed, progressive, and high-performing team, this is the place. They have a broad range of activities, services, and facilities, both directly and with its affiliates and independent organizations. The organization is more than 50 years in service; however, they have a modern, positive, and committed business plan. 

 Villa Charities Inc. offers a competitive salary, flexible work schedule, a comprehensive benefits package including a free gym/health club membership (on-campus), Employee Assistance Programs, and Wellness Programs that include wellness month, Discounted food from their Italian Café, house leagues, and many more. They are slowly modernizing the facilities; however, they have state of art Athletic facilities, offices, and systems. Management is always willing to listen and open to new ideas.

Villa Charities has transformed COVID19 and is becoming a more robust, stable, and result-oriented organization that will positively impact society.
cons: No company is perfect. The operations of Villa Charities are very complex in terms of their areas of operations. if you don't stay focused, you can easily lose sight.
